website_summaries.verdict: Fits older children and adults well, making it a great kneeboard for sharing.
pros: Lightweight kneeboard is easy to carry to the lake or river
A good size for pre-teens through adults
Durable board that will resist rotting and water damage
cons: Board seems to bounce a lot during trips over choppy water

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it does a fantastic job of collecting dust in my garage. Seems like a quality board.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to get my kids into more than just tubing behind the boat. They love it! Easy to launch and maneuver. The tow handle holder works great! Pops up with me no problem, the padded top makes hopping through choppy water comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: eoddavid

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try knee boarding and borrowed a friends board once. Tired a whole bunch of times to get up onto the board and it never happened. With this board, because it has the holder for the handle, you can focus more on getting up onto the board without having to hold on tight to the handle. You still have to have your hands on it, but it makes it much more easy. Only took three tries and I was up on the board. Great value for what you pay and has been holding up nicely all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, as long as you understand that To use it you’ll want to lay on it first then after you’re already moving behind the boat you transition to your knees and strap in. We had to figure this out, but found it easy and great for kids (ours are 6+) and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Its okay but not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: The board is a bit small for me as I am 6'3. It is a bit unstable for beginners as I am trying to teach the kids to use it. All in all I wouldn't purchase it again for those reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Chas Farm

customer_reviews.title: Great board, preferred over Driftsun 2018 by my kids.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a beginner board for my 10, 12 and 14 year old kids and they LOVE it! I also bought the Driftsun 2018 board this summer and they prefer this board. Getting up is easy, the ride is smooth and solid, and my 10 year old can already do 360’s with it. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan E Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and build, strap is great.
customer_reviews.text: We had a great time with the kneeboard. the key to getting up if you are using the hook is as the boat is still getting up to speed, pull up to your knees and grab the handle as soon as possible. We found the people that hesitated and were taking their time would end up bouncing up and down pretty violently. so i had to stop the boat and restart. was great for getting out of the wake doing spins, riding backwards etc. Good time overall!
customer_reviews.author: Tpunx99gsx

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, easy to learn on and fun!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kneeboard for my older teens and they love it!! We had only used tubes with our pontoon boat and are pleased with the diversity this towable offers. It is stable as well as challenging. The padding is nice. If you are looking for something else fun to tow we would highly recommend this one!! Older children, teens and adults would all enjoy! Shipped as promised!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela F.

customer_reviews.title: Decal peeling off
customer_reviews.text: The board overall is great for my grandchildren learning how to kneeboard. The only issue is after only a couple of uses the decal is peeling off which makes the board look unsightly. For a new board I would have hoped the decal would had lasted for at least a few years instead of only a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: murrayra

customer_reviews.title: Great kneeboard for the money!
customer_reviews.text: My sons aged 10 and 9 recently tried kneeboarding and wanted to get their own. The hook is perfect for them to be able to get strapped in and they can easily get up and going on this board. The board feels a little stiff for me and on my ankles, but that could be an age factor.
customer_reviews.author: Golf Ball

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners but hard on knees
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner, it is very easy to use and learn from, but the knee pads are not very comfortable! Was able to make a 360 successfully. Strap is wide and comfortable. Bottom is not very smooth. Rope holder serves it’s purpose well. If purchasing for adult use, pay more for better knee support.
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great for adults and kids
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it add much as adults. I have 8 and 5 year olds boys who can't get enough. The top has a spot to hook the rope to make it easy to get up. Perfect! There was no hassle in the purchase and it arrived in a coupe of days. Fat and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This was a first outing to teach the kids how to kneeboard. The kids had a blast on this kneeboard. My 11 yo son got up on his second try and was doing 360s on the second day. 9 yo daughter was up on her first attempt. The handle holder was awesome and took the stress off their arms while getting up to speed and strapped in. I'm 5'9" 170 and got up easily and was comfortable for me. My daughter and I even rode 2 up on it which was a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: J. Haby

customer_reviews.title: Good for family fun of all ages
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a couple inches wider. The hook makes it nice for beginners. The narrowness is the board means you really get sprayed while cutting. 360 turns are difficult due to the fin design. My daughter who’s 18 can ride it by standing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Cole

customer_reviews.title: Thank god for the hook
customer_reviews.text: I love the hook on this thing. It makes it so much easier to get up on the board. DOn't get me wrong, you still have to get your knees strapped in but at least i'm not struggling with handle and having to get u on the board.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Paclebar

customer_reviews.title: Great board for a beginner or a child!
customer_reviews.text: Great Kneeboard! My oldest has a neuromuscular disease and was upset after watching his two younger siblings on our older kneeboard. The hook for the rope on this board allows him to lay on the board and get the same experience without having to worry about hanging on. Probably not the intended market, but it worked great for our needs! I have no doubt a child or beginner can easily get on and ride with the handy hook!
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: light weight, sti;; strong
customer_reviews.text: Kids used it once this summer, we got it right before the end of summer, and they like it alot more than the traditional hydro slide we broke this year. Turns easy, rope holder is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Corey E. Tyner

customer_reviews.title: Good knee board
customer_reviews.text: We were pleasantly surprised as how nice this knee board is for the cost. We used it daily for a week at Lake Powell and have used it multiple times since then. All the grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Our 11 and 12 year old's love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 and 12 year old's love it!! They were able to get up in a couple of tries and knee boarded until we ran out of gas! Comfortable and good, solid strap, great price, recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Super Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: The hook on the front makes it really easy to start for first timers. My daughter (12) got right up. The knee strap is robust and easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: NuDad Chris

customer_reviews.title: Hard to control
customer_reviews.text: This one is harder to get up on than the other one my son had, it also doesn’t have retractable fans which he liked on the other one he could do turns this one is a little harder to control
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it, we had a few different ones that were returned for either comfort issues or it simply was difficult to use. This one worked great and it's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Tom W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a little on the small side
customer_reviews.text: The board is made well it’s just a lot thinner in width than expected. This board would be perfect for kids and teens but a little bit to small for adults. Other than that I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: James and Lori

customer_reviews.title: Hook makes it easy!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use even for beginners. Hook on front for tow handle makes it much easier for even rookies to hold on to board. Much easier to pull up and strap in without having to worry about keeping a hand on the tow rope. Had three newbies about to get up on first try! Teens love it!
customer_reviews.author: T Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Knee board
customer_reviews.text: It looks just as described in the pictures. It is very light. Haven't got use it yet because I just received it today. I will post that review later.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Much Better Price than Others!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Kids Love this Knee Board and we have so much fun! Get yourself one of these and you won't be disappointed! Thank You!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rex Malson

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to learn on
customer_reviews.text: Got the board in the water and watched the video on usage. Let the board get going a little before your try getting up. Once up on this it is fun. Knees fit in the board just right for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: PeteStevers1

customer_reviews.title: Great board!
customer_reviews.text: This was shipped quickly and looked great. Our grandson has used it all over the lake. The quality seems to be good for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Great Knee Board
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it and the quality of the product is great. The only down side all the extra gas from pulling the kids around.
customer_reviews.author: Slider

customer_reviews.title: Shark bait
customer_reviews.text: Lots of shark bait fun if your in a Maine you may get taken by mistake for a sea lion and be attracted great white sharks
customer_reviews.author: Randy S. Whitman

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner board
customer_reviews.text: Good board for the money. Velcro came unstitched on knee strap after 4 uses. Glued it back with Gorilla fabric glue and seems to be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Eng208

customer_reviews.title: the Padding could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: well I Will Say This Really Hurts Your knees Especially When You Go Over Waves Or Hit The water Hard
customer_reviews.author: Laura P

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 10 and 8 yr old boys love this knee board - perfect for their current size and will be good as they grow.
customer_reviews.author: Noelleyb

customer_reviews.title: Good kneeboard for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2017. It's been pretty reliable until today. One of the strap guides pulled out of the base. Kind of a big deal as the strap is no longer functional. Can't complain too much as we have gotten much ride time out of it. Working on some kind of repair. Overall, worth the money. Nothing lasts forever.....
customer_reviews.author: boodaghost

customer_reviews.title: A kneeboard for the whole family to enjoy!
customer_reviews.text: Saving space on your boat for all your fun gear is essential. What is great about the design of this kneeboard is that both a 200lb adult man and a 40lb 4 year old can share the same board with ease. The board is extremely comfortable and stable, it comes with a heavy duty knee strap and a hook at the front making getting up and going a lot more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: The Shorters

customer_reviews.title: Great prodcut, lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Bought for our kids ages 11 and 14. Didn’t take too long for them to get the hang of it. Sturdy board. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mom 24

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: good price for quality board, the padding is pretty comfortable and grabs your legs well, happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Gave it some low stars cuz we were out on the lake and my husband crashed and it snapped the strap off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Able to get up in back of 650cc waverunner and have a blast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It broke shortly after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, the part that holds the strap to the board broke after only 4 or so uses. What a disappointment and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: J&A

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Very easy for beginners like myself to get on. The front clip that holds the handle is fantastic and the knee pads are comfy. I would consider myself fat and non athletic and I got up on this board the first try, almost anyone should be able to kneeboard with this Looking forward to using it the rest of this summer.
customer_reviews.author: kent

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! Easy enough for the kids to use good quality
customer_reviews.author: Frank M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Knee Board.
customer_reviews.text: All ages have ridden on it without any problems. Was worried about buying a knee board online but have been pleasantly surprised. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old grand daughter got up the first try. She had a ball!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is my first kneeboard. Never kneeboarded before. Got up on the second try and got the hang of it pretty quick. Board is very stable. Could use a little more padding on the rear but overall it’s great. I’m 31 and was worried about learning but this board made it easy. Would buy another
customer_reviews.author: Corey Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginner board
customer_reviews.text: Excellent knee board. Like the latch for placing the rope. Boat a new rope that has two bars to aid in pulling up.
customer_reviews.author: kevin sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great board.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking board. Can't wait to take it to the lake for my kids to learn on it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Best boating purchase we’ve made. Our 4 year old can use it and my husband and I can ride it. It’s a blast.
customer_reviews.author: C Sonnenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great fun on the water
customer_reviews.text: First attempts failed for 10 year old but second day was a quick success and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: TomB

customer_reviews.title: Hard pad
customer_reviews.text: Looks and handles well. Rode it twice in the same day and couldn’t ride it any more. My shins were so sore from the hard pad. Wish it had a better pad for knees and shins
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun
customer_reviews.text: Just started to use it. Having lots of fun. Great for beginners. I'm not sure about sturdiness yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and works great, no issues at all
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a 20 year old board. Lightweight and works great, no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: M. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last,  not durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year and used about a dozen times. Got it out for the first time this year and the handle that holds the strap in place broke off. Very disappointing. They don't make things like they used to.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Fast and good air
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this board!! The curve on the bottom makes it glide right on top of the water. Easy to go really fast and get good air.
customer_reviews.author: Candee Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Board!!
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this kneeboard sturdy and comfortable. The only reason I give four stars is because it is harder for people who are taller and/or just have a bigger body type. I was able to get up as i am shorter, but my friends were not at 5'8. Other than that no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Milnik

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not so good for 360’s but works good for my 7yr old
customer_reviews.author: Cory Hinze

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner board
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. He was able to get up right away. The nose hook is a great addition for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Adams

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BOARD AND ROPE!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. My Children used it yesterday and had a BLAST. Perfect fit, perfect and very comfortable sturdy rope! Will definitely buy again from your company
customer_reviews.author: Scarlette Glowe

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: The kneeboard came today and it is exactly what we were looking for. Looks like good quality and came delivered without any issues and in great condition. We got it out on the water and worked awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Nate Larson

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We had the board for a little over a year and the strap broke right out of the board, un fixable, while my 13 year granddaughter was riding it. The board may of been used 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. We had an issue with the strap and SereneLife took care of us right away. My daughter (12) was able to get up right away after I gave her instructions from a YouTube video.
customer_reviews.author: Cagenovese

customer_reviews.title: That the kids can use it and have fun
customer_reviews.text: Awesome the grandkids loved it and enjoyed it all summer
customer_reviews.author: amountains

customer_reviews.title: Not a great Kneeboard
customer_reviews.text: The padding is hard and the glue holding it down began to separate on the 2nd use. I returned the product. I will say both my daughters got up the first time with this board.
customer_reviews.author: Ryno2308

customer_reviews.title: Worked well and was soft on my knees
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to be the right size and be soft on my knees which it was and I also expected the Velcro to be made well which it was
customer_reviews.author: Serina

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This knee board is every thing described in the description.our family enjoyed it very much on our vacation. Even my 9 year old grandson boarded for the first time with easy.the only thing I think it could use is a lil more cushion for your knees an feet. Is give it 4.5 🌟
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for teenage beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for teenage beginners. Easy to use, kids caught on quick! Hook on the top held the rope easily, leaving the ability to use both hands to strap on! Will be using this board a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Mathias

customer_reviews.title: Easy for beginners
customer_reviews.text: The kids really like it, easy to ride, we've only had it one day, so can't comment on longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived undamaged but when we unpacked it the board looked like a used board. The paint was all messed up. It had shiny areas and dull areas. I didn't order a used board!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great item ships fast
customer_reviews.text: This thing not only looks cool it is great and easy to use kids love it
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Good starter board
customer_reviews.text: Good starter board. We have used it a few times this year. Decals are starting to lift off of the board after the 2nd use.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Stable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this knee board right from the start. It is made from a strong material and feels sturdy on the water. Now she never wants to leave the water.
customer_reviews.author: NY Dad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This wakeboard is really beautiful and functions perfectly! It’s exactly what we were looking for. Easy to use for even very beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Ordered item early before our yearly camping trip. The second time we used it the location where the strap goes u set snapped off. Too late to return. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kneeboard, especially for beginners. Have used several times and enjoy it very much
customer_reviews.author: Keatyn Cook

customer_reviews.title: Cracked in half in the first day of use 😔
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old son purchased this with his birthday money and was using it as instructed with a friend. The top third of the board cracked and broke completely away.
customer_reviews.author: Alea Sciarrone

customer_reviews.title: Knee board fun for all.
customer_reviews.text: Great board to expose my kids to a new water sport. The front attachment for the ski rope is huge help to make it easier for them to strap in as they start off.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Richter

customer_reviews.title: Nose dips a bit
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos had a struggle getting on this board. Once on, it does dip into the water a bit. Pretty solid board.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter popped right up on the kneeboard first try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get some speed before trying to get up. It's much easier.
customer_reviews.text: We were up and having an great day first time out. The rope hooks on the front very well.

customer_reviews.title: great for kids
customer_reviews.text: product is great for my 11 year old son. It seems to really make a great time better on the Lake.

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the grandkids. They were kneeboarding in no time.

customer_reviews.title: unhappy

customer_reviews.text: Great for children and small adults. Not recommended for large adults.

customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his birthday. He loves it! First day and he's already jumping the wakes!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just received and it seems to be a great product. Can't wait to start using it!

customer_reviews.text: Great kneeboard. Solid product and well made. Shipped quick and arrived perfect. Kids love it!

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner board

customer_reviews.text: Board appears sturdy, looks nice, and is well padded. Like it has hook for kids.

customer_reviews.text: After using about 5 hours, the strap pulled out of the board

customer_reviews.text: Love this kneeboard! Our family just used it for a week on the water and it worked great! Fast delivery! Would highly recommend this product!

customer_reviews.text: Very good board. The knee slots are nice and the overall weight is very light.

product_meta.title: SereneLife Water Sport Kneeboard with Hook for Kids & Adults, Kneeboard with Strap for Boating, Waterboarding, Kneeling Boogie Boarding, Knee Surfing
product_meta.description:
Color:Black/BlueThere's nothing quite like feeling the wind flow through your hair and the sun kiss your skin while you are out on the water. Most people hit the oars, draw their sails or pull their anchors to get away from the bustle, but who says you can't have fun out when lost among the waves? If water sports are your thing or if you are planning an aquatic adventure for the family, you're going to need a surface board you can count on to bring along the excitement! 

Don't think you need to grab a separate kid's knee board? Want the kids to learn how to share? This cushioned knee board is the top choice among those looking for water boards for kids, teenagers and adults! Use it as a water board for kids and then hop on it yourself to do a little board surfing so you can show the young ones how it's done. 

Kneel surfing is easier than ski surfing, which is why it is popular aquatic activity among kids and adults of all skill levels. And this water kneeboard is waiting to become your new surf companion! 

Don't miss out while everyone else soaks up some fun in the sun. Order your SereneLife boating knee board before the summer season arrives! 

WATER BOARD SPECIFICATIONS 
Construction Materials: reinforced polyurethane 
Knee Board Dimensions: 50"L x 20"W x 4.5"H 
Kneeboard Weight: 8.7 lbs
feature_bullets: #1 AQUA SPORT KNEEBOARD: Get ready to catch a wave! Our knee boards will have you showing off all of your awesome knee surfing skills when at the lake, at the beach or out on a rushing river.

ULTRALITE, EASY TO CARRY: Ready to ditch that worn down water board and get yourself an upgrade? Our kneeling board weighs a little under 9 lbs, which means it doesn't bog you down. It's small enough to fit in the cab of your vehicle or in a boat box.

STRAP FOR EXTRA SAFETY: You're of course going to need something to hold you in! Each SereneLife kneeboard is finished with an adjustable strap, making it the ideal water board for boat activities, lake surfing or river cruising.

UNIVERSAL KNEEL BOARDS: Measuring in at 50” long and 20” wide, our knee surfing board is just the right size to accommodate most older children, teens and adults. It's the perfect boating knee board to share!
DURABLE, WATER-RESISTANT: Made out of corrosion-proof and marine-grade materials, the boogie surf board is strong enough to be used by the pros and beginners alike!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
